sen.j: 洞院 実泰（とういん さねやす、文永6年（1269年） - 嘉暦2年8月15日 (旧暦)（1327年9月1日））は鎌倉時代後期の公卿。
sen.e: Saneyasu TOIN (1269 - September 1, 1327) was a court noble in the late Kamakura period.
Saneyasu TOIN (1269 - September 1, 1327) was a court noble in the late Kamakura period.

His father was Kinmori TOIN.
His father was Kinmori TOIN.
His father was Kinmori TOIN.
His mother was the wife of TAIRA no Chikatsugu.
sen.cmt: 平親継女は the wife of TAIRA no Chikatsuguとしました。
sen.e: His mother was a daughter of TAIRA no Chikatsugu.
sen.cmt: 「平親継女」は「平親継の娘」という意味で「平親継の妻」という意味ではありません。
sen.e: His mother was a daughter of TAIRA no Chikatsugu.
He had a child named Kinkata TOIN.
He had a child named Kinkata TOIN.
He had a child named Kinkata TOIN.
His Buddhist name was 後山本左府(Ushiro-yama motosafu).
sen.cmt: 後山本左府はUshiro-yama motosafuとしました。
sen.e: His go (pen) name was 後山本左府 (Ushiro-yama motosafu).
sen.cmt: 法名は次文です。また用語集で号はgo (pen)となっていますので、こちらを使用します。
sen.e: His go (pen) name was 後山本左府 (Ushiro-yama motosafu).
His homyo (posthumous Buddhist name) was Jakugen.
His homyo (a Buddhist name given to a person who has died or has entered the priesthood) was Jakugen.
sen.cmt: 法名には死後あたえられる名、という意味のほかに、出家受戒の時に授けられる名という意味もあるので、用語集のhomyo (a Buddhist name given to a person who has died or has entered the priesthood)を使用します。
sen.e: His homyo (a Buddhist name given to a person who has died or has entered the priesthood) was Jakugen.

sen.j: 文永6年（1269年）に洞院公守の子として生まれる。
sen.e: He was born as a child of Kinmori TOIN in 1269.
In 1269, he was born as a child of Kinmori TOIN.
sen.cmt: 以降のいくつかの文で年代が先に来た方が補足を入れたときに分かりやすい文章になるので、形式統一のため、年代の位置を変えました。
sen.e: In 1269, he was born as a child of Kinmori TOIN.

sen.j: 正和4年（1315年）に内大臣（1315年 - 1316年）となる。
sen.e: He became naidaijin (minister of the center) in 1315 (1315 to 1316).
In 1315, he became naidaijin (the Minister of the Palace) (1315 to 1316).
sen.cmt: 年代と年代補足の位置を変えました。naidaijin (minister of the center) をnaidaijin (Minister of the Palace) に変えました。
sen.e: In 1315, he became naidaijin (the Minister of the Palace) (1315 to 1316).

sen.j: 正和5年（1316年）に右大臣（1316年 - 1317年）となる。
sen.e: He became udaijin (minister of the right) in 1316 (1316 to 1317).
In 1316, he became udaijin (the Minister of the Right) (1316 to 1317).
sen.cmt: 年代と年代補足の位置を変えました。minister of the rightをMinister of the Rightと変えました。
sen.e: In 1316, he became udaijin (the Minister of the Right) (1316 to 1317).

sen.j: 文保元年（1317年）6月21日 (旧暦)、叙従一位。
sen.e: He became juichii (Junior First Rank) on June 21, 1317.
In August 6, 1317 (June 21, 1317 in the old lunar calendar), he was raised to juichii (Junior First Rank).
sen.cmt: 旧暦のままでしたので、直しました。叙＝was raised to と直しました。
sen.e: In August 6, 1317 (June 21, 1317 in the old lunar calendar), he was raised to juichii (Junior First Rank).

sen.j: 文保2年（1318年）に左大臣（1318年 - 1322年）となる。
sen.e: He became sadaijin (minister of the left) in 1318 (1318 to 1322).
In 1318, he became sadaijin (Minister of the Left) (1318 to 1322).
sen.cmt: 年代と年代補足の位置を変えました。minister of the leftをMinister of the Leftと変えました。
sen.e: In 1318, he became sadaijin (Minister of the Left) (1318 to 1322).
He died in 1327.
